entry.tran: (通常指男性)消防队员，救火队员
entry.def: A fireman is a person, usually a man, whose job is to put out fires.

means.word_mean: 1. play in which children take the roles of firemen and pretend to put out a fire
2. a laborer who tends fires (as on a coal-fired train or steamship)
3. a pitcher who does not start the game
4. a member of a fire department who tries to extinguish fires
